Description.Text: Experts in offering high-quality service, the Hampton Inn Manhattan Seaport-Financial District offers pet-friendly New York accommodation near public transport links located in the heart of the city that never sleeps. Located within walking distance of Chinatown, South Street Seaport Museum and Federal Hall National Memorial, the Hampton Inn provides a good base for exploring Manhattan. Modern amenities and a host of guest services including an ATM, laundry room and wireless-enabled public areas are just some of the things that make this New York hotel such a good choice.

• PACE University - 0.1 miles S • Bank of New York - 0.4 miles E • New York Stock Exchange - 0.4 miles E • JP Morgan Capital Corporation - 0.5 miles SW • Goldman Sachs - 0.3 miles S • PriceWaterHouse Coopers - 1 mile NW • Merrill Lynch - 1 mile W • American Express - 0.5 miles W • Deloitte and Touche - 0.5 miles W • Prudential Insurance/Securitie - 0.1 miles W • Chelsea Piers - 2 miles NW • Madison Square Garden - 4.8 miles NW • South Street Seaport - 0.1 miles S • Carneige Hall - 5.8 miles NW

Guest rooms at the Hampton Inn Manhattan Seaport-Financial District Hotel are more than comfortable, offering guests the opportunity to sleep in cosy Cloud Nine beds, and have deluxe amenities such as high-speed Internet access, a lap desk and a full work desk, particularly useful for the business traveller. Wake up in your comfy New York hotel room, have a soothing shower thanks to a WaterPik® showerhead and fluffy towels in the private bathroom before going down for your delicious breakfast. Book Single and Double Queen bedrooms, complete with hair-dryer, iron and an easy-to-set alarm clock radio.
Check-in: 3:00PM Check-out: 12:00PM Pets: Allowed Maximum size: Medium Maximum weight: 25 lbs

From Holland Tunnel to 9A West St. South to South St. to FDR North, Exit 2 to Civic Center, left on Pearl. 495W to Brooklyn, Exit 29, slight right on Tillary, right to Brooklyn Bridge Blvd./Adams Street, FDR Dr., Pearl St. Ramp, left at fork, right to Pearl.
Area Restaurants: • Cabana Nuevo Latino • Pizzeria Uno • Bridge Cafe • MarkJoseph Steakhouse • Quartino • Bennie Thai Cafe • American Park at the Battery • Peter Luger Steak House • Radio Mexico Cafe

The newly constructed Hampton Inn Manhattan Seaport Financial District is located in Southern Manhattan's Seaport area. The hotel is located on Pearl Street between Peck Slip and Frankfurt Streets directly beside the famous Brooklyn Bridge.
